name: Crag & Pig
description:
Run for your lives! The sky is falling! Join us in a twisted tale where Crag & his pal Pig must dodge burnings rocks to stay alive while also collecting stars!

Play the "hottest" game on mobile!

** “#1 caveman & pig game in the world!” **
** "This game is freaking nuts!" **
** "The action doesn't end. It just gets harder and harder." **
** "Very Addictive." **

CRAG & PIG

Key features:
• Endless action
• Vivid cartoon look and feel
• Adorable characters that you’ll love to save!
• Easy to play, hard to play awesome
• Constant free updates with new game play innovations

ALREADY A FAN? Like the Crag & Pig on Facebook or follow them on Twitter for all the latest prehistoric swine gossip.
* Facebook: http://facebook.com/orangethinkbox
* Twitter: http://twitter.com/orangethinkbox
